thread.title: Nick Johnston
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Nick Johnston

author: Nick Johnston
title: Nick Johnston
text:
I found Freeze Pro Shop as it offered the specific product I wanted at the best available price. I was then delighted at the speed with which the product arrived. I also ordered the wrong size in the first instance (my own fault rather than the company's) and the refund process was very convenient.
I'd highly recommend Freeze Pro Shop and will likely use this site again in future.
